_aChangeLog.text: you no longer can enter mid from ramp

_sText:
Map made in support of Bilhorod People's Republic citizens and other declared republics in eastern Europe as they struggle to get independence.


Map takes action in city of Bilhorod, capital of BPR. Glorious fighters of Bilhorod  People's Militia (CTs) were just delivering bavovna to poor civilians, but russian saboteurs (Ts) want to prevent them from doing good by bombing either house of mayor of Bilhorod Niemytyj Yevhenij (Bombsite A) or oil refinery (Bombsite B).

reasons to download:
- well optimized
- simple layout
- FUN
- "наче реально з хлопцями приїхав вгамувати залишки руснявого опору у бєлґороді" - єдиний тестер
- кацапи у коментах реально ниють
